titles.title: To amend chapter 11 of title 35, United States Code, to require the voluntary collection of demographic information for patent applications, and for other purposes.
Women Inventor Development and Equality Act
Women Inventor Development and Equality Act
Women Inventor Development and Equality Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Women Inventor Development and Equality Act
This bill directs the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to collect and publish demographic information (including gender, race, and ethnicity) that is voluntarily submitted by inventors who apply for patents.
